title: Brand new two storied holiday bungalow for RENT in Katunayake
details:
Two storied house located in Katunayake, ideal for foreigners to live a comfortable and peaceful life in a serene green environment full of fruit trees. Property is 3 minutes’ drive from the Katunayake International Airport, FTZ & Colombo / Katunayake Expressway. Can be used as 2 separate housing units or as one unit.
30 feet road access. 20 minutes to Colombo through Colombo Katunayake Expressway. 10 minutes to the Negombo beach. So why pay more rent to live in Colombo area.

Furthermore, this property also offers a unique combination of ideal living conditions to anyone with preference to living in a relaxed, stress-free, and restful environment, yet with easy access to highways, other prominent towns and commercial landmarks.

Property details as follows:
• The house is designed with antique doors & windows
• Fully tiled
• Two bed rooms
• One living area can be used as a large room
• Two modern attached bath rooms
• Garden full of fruit trees
• Garden dining table
• Wheelchair access
• Absolutely delightful natural constant cool breeze
• Eco ground water & storage water tank
• 3 phase electricity
• Car park
• 16 foot parapet wall
